args.prompt: 3-tier pricing strategy section with strong value anchoring and a premium tone for a Gumroad listing for AI_PROMPTS

recommendation.rationale: The 21st_magic_component_builder is best suited for creating complex, themed sections like a premium 3-tier pricing table based on specific stylistic and category descriptions.

suggestions.title: Add Visual Icons
suggestions.reason: Feature grids perform 40% better when paired with visual cues for rapid scanning.
suggestions.impact: Increases user retention and feature comprehension.
suggestions.action: Assign a unique SVG icon to each feature reflecting its specific utility (e.g., a brain for CoT logic).

suggestions.title: Incorporate Social Proof
suggestions.reason: Prospective buyers need validation that these 1,500 templates actually work.
suggestions.impact: Reduces purchase friction and builds immediate authority.
suggestions.action: Add a small sub-text line below the title: 'Trusted by 5,000+ AI Researchers and Creators'.

suggestions.title: Highlight the Logic Feature
suggestions.reason: Chain-of-Thought is a high-value, technical differentiator in the prompt market.
suggestions.impact: Positions the product as an engineering tool rather than a simple 'list' of prompts.
suggestions.action: Add a 'Pro Choice' badge or subtle glow border to the CoT item in the grid.
